website_summaries.verdict: The Urbanears Kransen is a budget earphone pair that delivers intense bass response at a very affordable price.
pros: Powerful deep bass response, no distortion at top volumes
Earpieces snap together for easier, tangle-free stowing
cons: Too bass-heavy and not enough high-mid or high frequency presence for purists

customer_reviews.title: I always come back to these
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite pair of headphones! These were a runner up in a Wirecutter Under $100 category one year and I bought them on that recommendation. They produce the best sound of any headphones in this price category and I've gone through at least 3 other pairs including Wirecutter's topic pick, the Brainwavz Delta. The Kransens are better in my opinion. Strong bass but not overpowering, clear and rich sound in every range. The earbuds click together to reduce tangle and the other end has an appendage to tie it together. Cons: The sound that travels up the cords is a little louder than other headphones I've used, but it's not unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: G. House

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I have now had them for quite a while, and they just work! great sound, great fit (once I realised my ears are apparently very small, and changed to the smallest size), they even block out quite a bit of external noise (sometimes I can't hear people talking to me, even without music!). The wrap conveniently, and this kevlar (I think it was kevlar...) covering on the wire is absolutely brilliant, I have not had them tear or start to rip, and I carry them around with me all over the place!
customer_reviews.author: n.w.

customer_reviews.title: I have never seen a pair of headphones with a more intelligently designed means of preventing the tangling of left-and-right bud
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most intelligently-designed headphones I have ever owned. I have never seen a pair of headphones with a more intelligently designed means of preventing the tangling of left-and-right buds, since they clip together, nor the integrated cable tie built into the plug to keep them managed. The plug did not quite seat in the headphone jack of my phone, but a little trimming with an exacto knife solved the connection issues. The buds are a mite on the large side, which means that people who don't have a nice large crook for the buds to rest in like I do might want to look at the smaller Urbanears Bagis. I might get those next, if and when these die.
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, mic and remote don't work with my phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, mic and remote don't work with my Android phone. I've tried two pairs, so I'm assuming it's a design flaw instead of a broken pair. When I press the remote, I get noise in my ear, but no status on phone. Other mic/remote earphones work with my phone. Go figure. I give the earphones five stars for use as earphones, zero stars as a headset. I like the sound and durability enough to recommend them despite this failing, but I would not have bought them without this feature initially.
customer_reviews.author: Messer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable but great while they last.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Approximately 9 months into service speaker jack broke -June/July 2015, purchased Aug 2014. Was past Amazon return date, previously published Urban ears warranty of 1 year was not honored when I contacted them through their web site repeatedly. Original: 4/5 Stars. Great headphones, I love the notch in the strain protector to keep them from coming unwound in my pack. The cloth cord protector keeps them from getting snagged or stuck. Great, rich deep audio quality/tone. Only down side is the ball joint that splits the cable is rock hard and will poke your sternum.
customer_reviews.author: Allen H

customer_reviews.title: the decision was really difficult but I'm satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was using different models of Sennheiser during last 8-9 years. You will have many options for USD50 price range so, the decision was really difficult but I'm satisfied with this purchase. After burning a while (two nights of continuous playing) the sound of this earphones improved a lot. Very nice design and good quality components. The only complain it's the same for Sennheiser's earphones: the cable transmit some frictional noise while you are walking. But besides that, I'm happy with this earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Use these while traveling to watch movies on airplanes (with my tablet or the built-in entertainment systems). Great sound quality and fit. The fit is so good, that it blocks almost all airplane noise--no need for expensive noise cancelling products.Also love the self storing capability--keeps it neat and out of trouble when tossed into my bag during travel.
customer_reviews.author: Another Prime addict

customer_reviews.title: Very good design, good bass, great fit..
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones for my brother and let me tell you i love these. They fit right into your ears and isolate the outside noise very well. Bass is good i am not saying the best but for this price range i cannot skip these headphones.. i like this brands designs.
customer_reviews.author: ishak

customer_reviews.title: They are okay in terms of sound but they did ...
customer_reviews.text: They are okay in terms of sound but they did not last very long. I did not take them to exercise nor any other harmful activity but the microphone and controller stopped working a month or so in. I expected a tad more out of these headphones, at least for the microphone/control to break last...
customer_reviews.author: Alex B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I like them. The sound is more than adequet, and the loop near the plug is great for preventing tangles. The cloth covering is comfortable, as are the earbuds themselves. I did notice the cloth fraying a tad near the plug, but it doesn't seem to have gotten worse since I first noticed it (more than a couple weeks ago). I've only been using them for about a month and a half, so I can't speak on how long the last. They don't seem any worse off than any other earbuds I've owned, though, and they're not as pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Paris

customer_reviews.title: The sound is awesome for both listening to music and having phone conversations
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a backup to my travel headset and for driving. The sound is awesome for both listening to music and having phone conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Just got them, so I can't comment on durability, but these earbuds sound fantastic. The highs are slightly tinny sounding, but negligible once you listen to them for a while. However, the bass and mids are some of the fullest and deepest sounding I've ever heard coming from a pair of 40 dollar earbuds. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Miller

customer_reviews.title: wonder for music
customer_reviews.text: Great bass but can get uncomfortable at times. Since I bought my bluetooth earbuds I don't use these to much.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Impressive, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had a more than a few inner ear headphones in the last 3 years (2 cats, they think anything dangling is fair game). The Urbanears Kransen phones are the best IEM's I've had. I won't pay more than $50 for any headphone, but for the money these are worth more than $50 to my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Friarhoss

customer_reviews.title: Still great
customer_reviews.text: I'm still using these after so long, they have proven time to time to be superior to everything else I try.
customer_reviews.author: lg

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Issues
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, but this is the THIRD PAIR of Urbanears that have FAILED ON ONE SIDE in under 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: lvc

customer_reviews.title: ... been using them since a month and they work pretty good. they fit well into your ear
customer_reviews.text: Have been using them since a month and they work pretty good.they fit well into your ear !!!
customer_reviews.author: bathula bharath

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality for the price. Surprised me how crisp the sound was. The bass kicks too.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable sound from comfortable in-ears!!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned so many headphones over the years, and it's unfortunate that Urbanears buds never get the respect they deserve. Simply put, they are the best in-ear headphones you will ever use. They are loud with great lows, mids, and highs. They are comfortable. They have perfect noise isolation (the sound won't bleed out so others can hear), and they are super cheap. Truly epic headphones. Everyone that comes into Best Buy - where I work - I always recommend these headphones. Congrats UE on yet another killer in-ear set. GET THESE NOW.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome earphones
customer_reviews.text: High on bass. Impressive noise- isolation effect.. Am loving this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Adithya Hari

customer_reviews.title: Amazing built quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Lasted longer than expected and the sound quality is just amazing. Definitely recommend these over any other earphones.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.text: Good headphones but my left earbud stopped working after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Brayant

customer_reviews.title: Doing great so far
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are doing great. They feel fairly sturdy, and sound great with music. I also use them on my laptop/phone while doing video calls and the mic picks up ok, sometimes I have to hold it a little close to my mouth but mostly it works as expected for something so small anyways. Liked it so much bought a second for my partner.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: Bass is full and vocals are nice and clear. Compact, minimalistic design is perfect for everyday use. The wrap-up feature is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Xander Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're not bad, wanted more sound/bass they are quiet but surely loud enough for anyone. Decent Sq
customer_reviews.author: Matt Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound but horrible to PC/Stereo usage due to design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Headphones have nice features like cloth covered cable, the ear pieces snap together to prevent some tangling, etc. but if you plan to use these on a PC then look else where. When you plug these into a PC/Stereo you get about 50% volume in the right ear and even less in the left ear. Most notably is most all bass is not played with out the play/pause button held in at all times on the remote. You can resolve this by wrapping a twist tie around the button to hold it down at all times but you shouldn't have to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Simon

product_meta.title: Urbanears Kransen in-Ear Headphones
product_meta.description:
Urbanears - Kransen is a premium in-ear model engineered with a hefty dose of Urbanears DNA. Minimal, yet packed with features, Kransen is ergonomically designed to stay anchored in your ear even when you move around. It’s built to deliver pre- cise and powerful bass tones and is finely tuned across a wide bandwidth, so you can hear more of your music. Kransen also features SnapConstruction and the CableLoop, which allows you to wrap up your cord when you’re not using your headphones. Because neat is nice.



 * Compatible with any music players using 3.5 mm standard
 * Compatible with unprotected 3.5 mm standard such as iPhone, Blackberry, HTC and more


TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS:
 * 10 mm dynamic drivers
 * Frequency Response 20Hz-20kHz
 * Impedance 16ohm
 * Sensitivity 100dB
 * Max Input Power 100mW
